data.Quote: If you think you can or think you can't, either way you are right.
data.Author: Henry Ford

data.Quote: What got you here won't get you there.
data.Author: Unknown

data.Quote: If you are the smartest person in the room, you are in the wrong room.
data.Author: Unknown

data.Quote: Growth begins at the end of your comfort zone.
data.Author: Neale Donald Walsch

data.Quote: Take criticism gracefully, even when you disagree with it. If nothing else, you're learning something valuable about how someone else sees you.
data.Author: Allison Green

data.Quote: The only thing I regret about my past is the length of it. If I had to live my life again, I'd make the same mistakes, only sooner.
data.Author: Tallulah Bankhead
